				Plan on a program-wide basis, except that the Stacked Income Protection Plan

text.#text: The

Provide coverage for
				revenue loss of not more than 30 percent of expected county revenue, specified
				in increments of 5 percent.

The deductible is the minimum percent
				of revenue loss at which indemnities are triggered under the plan, not to be
				less than 10 percent of the expected county revenue.

Once the deductible is met, any losses
				in excess of the deductible will be paid up to the coverage selected by the
				producer.
